turns.text: So do you have an opinion on credit cards
turns.label: qy

turns.text: What what do you think about them
turns.label: qo

turns.text: I think they get lot of people in trouble
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah definitely I have one right now and um I just got it about eight six months ago --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- and I find that it makes it lot easier to get things that you generally wouldnt get
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Yeah and then you dont stop to realize that you know you charge this for twenty charge that for twenty charge this for twenty and pretty soon you owe hundred dollars and you dont stop to think about it
turns.label: aa

turns.text: I got in trouble when I was in the service quite few years ago like ten to fifteen thousand dollars in trouble
turns.label: sd

turns.text: And then you know so I eventually got it all paid Now I carry one I have gas card and Visa card And I never use them unless I need to
turns.label: sd

turns.text: - - yeah I I made rule with myself when I got one that if I couldnt pay it in full every month that Id have to rip it up so -
Stops all them interest rates and interest rates arent none too shallow these days anyway

But I know lot of people that get in trouble with them especially you know - we have - Im in Lubbock and we have bunch of college kids around here going to Tech and they seem to get in trouble with them lot
turns.label: sd

turns.text: uh-huh I have I have couple friends too that have about three of them maxed out And they --
turns.label: b

turns.text: -- they cant do anything but work to try to pay them off And and and like one of my friends she has hers is up to nine hundred dollars and she do- she only earns like two hundred dollars month because shes going to school

And and so I mean thats just enough to pay rent and buy like thirty-five dollars worth of food month So and and pay for her like like monthly fee like twen- - yo- I guess you have to pay like twenty dollars each month is the -- -
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- so all shes paying is interest on hers every month
turns.label: sd

turns.text: It just seems crazy to to me but -
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Well my wife got in trouble one time with hers She was making like I dont know what she was making forty-five dollars month I think And fifteen dollars of it was because she was over the limit and fifteen dollars of it was interest so she was only paying in it fifteen dollars month
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So and that was before we got married so - But its - you know we sat down and talked about it and discussed it and its its come out pretty good Now we have eighteen year old thats fixing to get out of high school and go to college
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Thats the first thing he wanted
turns.label: sd

turns.text: So we kind of discussed that little bit and shot that idea down right quick
turns.label: sd^e

turns.text: Yeah I I dont know Im about sick of mine right now I dont -
turns.label: b

turns.text: But I think theyre too readily accessible --
turns.label: sv

turns.text: -- and theres too many companies out there that are willing to give them to you and get you dra- get you trapped I mean you can always file bankruptcy to get out of it but thats lot of pain and hassle When you know in the olden days when my parents were growing up and we couldnt afford everything we didnt have such things as credit cards We just waited until time come around that we could afford it
turns.label: sv

turns.text: And you know we had all the necessities so And I very seldom use credit card on necessities I always use it for something I want not something I need
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Yeah my parents are really good about not using credit cards They are against it
turns.label: aa

turns.text: I dont think they like the fact that I have one either
turns.label: sd

turns.text: I think if card cards were as as stringent as say home mortgage loan or something like that where you have to you know be able to prove that you can afford this and the rest of your bills we probably wouldnt have the problems we have
turns.label: sv

turns.text: Of course we wouldnt have the retail market we have either so I guess they trade one for the other
turns.label: sv

turns.text: I disagree with it but they still trade one for the other
turns.label: sd

turns.text: Well thats good Im - it sounds like you kind of got your head together in the credit department for - you sound pretty young so -
turns.label: ba

turns.label: aa

Yeah It sure is So do you just have two kids or -
